Description: Getter returns reference to mutable field - caller can modify internal state
Recommendation: Low priority - QQQ fluent pattern; consider defensive copies for security-sensitive fields

Description: Constructor throws exception leaving object partially initialized - vulnerable to finalizer attacks
Recommendation: Review - consider factory methods or two-phase initialization

Description: Serializable class has non-transient non-serializable field
Recommendation: Low priority - QQQ rarely serializes objects; mark fields transient if needed

Description: Catching generic Exception instead of specific exception types
Recommendation: Yes - catch specific exceptions for better error handling

Description: File path constructed from user input - potential directory traversal attack
Recommendation: Review each case - validate/sanitize paths or use allowlists

Description: Instance method writes to static field - potential race condition
Recommendation: Yes - use proper synchronization or redesign to avoid static mutation

Description: Uses default platform encoding instead of explicit charset
Recommendation: Yes - specify StandardCharsets.UTF_8 explicitly

Description: Public static method returns reference to mutable static field
Recommendation: Review - return defensive copy or immutable wrapper

Description: Value assigned to local variable is never used
Recommendation: Yes - easy cleanup; remove dead assignments

Description: Iterates over Map.keySet() then calls get() - inefficient
Recommendation: Yes - use Map.entrySet() for direct key-value access

Description: SQL query constructed from non-constant string - potential SQL injection
Recommendation: Review - ensure parameterized queries are used; may be false positives

Description: Singleton getter not synchronized - race condition in lazy init
Recommendation: Review - use enum singleton or synchronized initialization

Description: Format string uses \n instead of %n - not portable across platforms
Recommendation: Yes - replace \n with %n in format strings

Description: Redundant null check on value that cannot be null
Recommendation: Yes - remove unnecessary null checks

Description: Static field should be declared final
Recommendation: Yes - add final modifier to static fields

Description: Object created but never used
Recommendation: Yes - remove unused object creation

Description: XML constructed from user input - potential XML injection
Recommendation: Review - validate/escape XML content or use safe APIs

Description: Public primitive field should be private with accessor
Recommendation: Yes - encapsulate with getter/setter

Description: Loading value that is known to be null
Recommendation: Review - likely logic error or dead code

Description: Method returns null for Boolean return type - can cause NPE on unboxing
Recommendation: Yes - return Boolean.FALSE instead of null

Description: Lazy initialization of static field is not thread-safe
Recommendation: Yes - use proper synchronization or eager initialization

Description: Exception might be ignored silently
Recommendation: Yes - at minimum log the exception

Description: Return value of method without side effects is ignored
Recommendation: Review - likely missing assignment or unnecessary call

Description: Using non-short-circuit logic operator (& instead of &&)
Recommendation: Review - may be intentional; usually should use short-circuit

Description: Clone method calls overridable method - subclass could break clone
Recommendation: Review - call final or private methods in clone

Description: HTTP parameter constructed unsafely - potential parameter pollution
Recommendation: Review - validate/encode HTTP parameters

Description: Command constructed from user input - potential command injection
Recommendation: Yes - validate input; use ProcessBuilder with argument list

Description: Unchecked cast may throw ClassCastException at runtime
Recommendation: Review - add instanceof check or handle ClassCastException

Description: Field is never used
Recommendation: Yes - remove unused fields

Description: Velocity template constructed from user input - potential template injection
Recommendation: Review - validate template content

Description: Non-serializable value stored in serializable field
Recommendation: Low priority - mark field transient if serialization needed

Description: Return value should be checked (e.g. File.delete())
Recommendation: Yes - check return value and handle failure

Description: Redundant null check - value is definitely null
Recommendation: Review - likely logic error

Description: File path for output constructed from user input
Recommendation: Review - validate/sanitize output paths

Description: Resource may not be closed on exception path
Recommendation: Yes - use try-with-resources

Description: Static field should have reduced visibility
Recommendation: Yes - reduce visibility to package-private

Description: Lazy init of static field not thread-safe
Recommendation: Yes - use synchronization or eager init

Description: Sensitive information exposed in error message
Recommendation: Yes - sanitize error messages shown to users

Description: Circular class initialization dependency
Recommendation: Review - may cause initialization issues

Description: Equals method always returns false
Recommendation: Yes - fix equals implementation

Description: Clone method does not call super.clone()
Recommendation: Yes - call super.clone() first

Description: Primitive unboxed then immediately reboxed
Recommendation: Yes - avoid unnecessary boxing/unboxing

Description: Public/protected field is never read
Recommendation: Review - remove or reduce visibility

Description: Field is never read
Recommendation: Yes - remove unused field

Description: Unsafe comparison of hash values - timing attack possible
Recommendation: Yes - use constant-time comparison for security hashes

Description: Unread field should be static
Recommendation: Yes - make field static

Description: PreparedStatement SQL from non-constant - may still be injectable
Recommendation: Review - ensure SQL structure is safe

Description: Comparator should implement Serializable
Recommendation: Low priority - add Serializable if comparator is stored

Description: Script engine evaluates user input - code injection risk
Recommendation: Review - validate/sandbox script execution

Description: Negating compareTo result can overflow for Integer.MIN_VALUE
Recommendation: Yes - use Integer.compare() or proper comparison

Description: Stream opened but may not be closed
Recommendation: Yes - use try-with-resources

Description: Resource not closed on all paths
Recommendation: Yes - use try-with-resources

Description: Class name suggests exception but doesn't extend Exception
Recommendation: Review - rename class or extend Exception

Description: Field in subclass masks field in superclass
Recommendation: Review - rename field or use super explicitly

Description: Using % 2 == 1 fails for negative numbers
Recommendation: Yes - use % 2 != 0 or (x & 1) != 0

Description: Password is hardcoded in source code
Recommendation: Yes - remove immediately; use config/secrets manager

Description: Class inherits equals but adds fields without overriding
Recommendation: Review - override equals to include new fields

Description: Random object created and used only once - poor randomness
Recommendation: Yes - reuse Random instance

Description: Map.entrySet() entries may be reused - don't store references
Recommendation: Review - copy entry values if storing

Description: instanceof check will always be false
Recommendation: Yes - fix type check or remove dead code
